example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2VpnGateway -VpnGatewayId vgw-1a2b3c4d
AvailabilityZone : State : available Tags : {} Type : ipsec.1 VpcAttachments : {vpc-12345678} VpnGatewayId : vgw-1a2b3c4d
example.description: This example describes the specified virtual private gateway.

example.code:
PS C:\>$filter = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Filter PS C:\> $filter.Name = "state" PS C:\> $filter.Values = @( "pending", "available" )
PS C:\> Get-EC2VpnGateway -Filter $filter
example.description: This example describes any virtual private gateway whose state is either pending or available.
This example describes all your virtual private gateways.
